column4: ive uninstalled kernel 2.6.24-16 but its still showing up in the boot menu... how do i remove it from grub?
what am i looking for in it?
i dont see a line with that
ok, what does the line say?
that's how it should be. dpkg -l | grep linux-image
I don't care what you "get" I want to see it myself. pastebin
